name: Blaseball: Wild Cards - A Player's Guide
name_original: Blaseball: Wild Cards - A Player's Guide
description:
Hi! We're Wayfinder Games, the makers of Wild Cards... everyone's favourite card game version of Blaseball! Admittedly it may be the ONLY card game version of Blaseball, but it's official, it's fun, and it's available now! 

Think of this as an interactive walkthrough of your first Blaseball: Wild Cards experience. It's written by the game designers to make sure everything goes as smoothly as possible, but if you have any questions, you can always give us a shout on Twitter - you can find us @blaseballtcg
